name: Regula el FPS pero causa delay
Video
Habilitar y desplegar para empezar a correr la transmisión de video.
Formato
format:
<style>
  .filled { 
      height: 100% !important;

      padding: 0 !important;
      margin: 0 !important;
  }
  .nr-dashboard-template {
      padding: 0;
      margin: 0;
  }
  
  .rounded {
  border-radius: 12px 12px 12px 12px;
}
 
   .bigfont {
  font-size: 18px;
}

   .smallfont {
  font-size: 12px;
}
  
</style>

<script>
$('.vibrate').on('click', function() {
  navigator.vibrate(100);
});

function restore_bg(x) {
            $(this).css("background-color", x);
    };

$('.touched').on('mousedown', function() {
    
    var x= $(this).css("background-color");
    $(this).css("background-color", "yellow");
    
    setTimeout(restore_bg.bind(this,x),100);
    navigator.vibrate(80);
    });
    
</script>

name: invert
func:
var input = msg.payload
if(input==500) input=2500
else if (input==2500) input=500
msg.payload = input
return msg;

Formato botones
format:
<style>
  .filled { 
      height: 100% !important;

      padding: 0 !important;
      margin: 0 !important;
  }
  .nr-dashboard-template {
      padding: 0;
      margin: 0;
  }
  
  .rounded {
  border-radius: 12px 12px 12px 12px;
}
 
   .bigfont {
  font-size: 18px;
}

   .smallfont {
  font-size: 12px;
}

  
</style>

<script>
$('.vibrate').on('touchstart mousedown', function() {
  navigator.vibrate(100);
});
$('.vibrate').on('touchend mouseup', function() {
  navigator.vibrate(100);
});

$('.vibrate').on('touchstart mousedown', function() {
  navigator.vibrate(100);
});

$scope.action = function(controlName) {

    var actioner = $scope[controlName];
    if (!actioner) {
      $scope[controlName] = actioner;
    }
 actioner.on('touchstart mousedown', function(e) { 
	e.preventDefault();
	$scope.send({"payload": 1});
	});
 actioner.on('touchend mouseup', function(e) {
	e.preventDefault();
	$scope.send({"payload": 1});
	});
  }
</script>
